All presentations and interaction will be online and LIVE on [Gather](https://gather.town/).

# Important

If you want to participate at our workshop, please fill [this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZnHcmIvAWIu0ILR2KuH8jQTCzUafoFu8cnrWr53syDrRajQ/viewform?gxids=7757).

### Deadline for registration

- Presenters: December, December, 08, 07:59 Japan Time - December 07, 23:59 Paris Time.
- General audience: December, 11, 23:59 Japan Time - December, 11, 15:59 Paris Time.

## Oral presentation 

- Young researcher / Student oral presentation: 15 minutes + 5 minutes for QA.
 
- Professor oral presentation: 20 minutes + 10 minutes for Questions and Answers.
	
All oral presenters should send their oral presentation slides (in PDF format) by December 15th, 23:59 (JST). These will be made available after the workshop, at the website.



## Poster presentation

To be held on the same day as the oral presentation. Each presenter should be at their designated spot on [Gather](https://gather.town/) during the time of their poster session.


All poster presenters should send a "presentation kit" by December, December, 08, 07:59 Japan Time - December 07, 23:59 Paris Time.

This kit includes:

1. Spotlight Video: They will be made available at the website and at the entrance of poster session room on [Gather](https://gather.town/).
- 1 minute long video with brief introduction of your presentation.
- Resolution: 720p or better.
- Format: mp4.

2. Spotlight slides: To be available at the website.
- Slides used in the spotlight video.
- 1 to 2 slides.
- Format: PDF.
Example of spotlight poster: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18yicA41vHFkrHAADiFty6_mbbn9JuPB6/view?usp=sharing

3. Poster: To be available at the poster session room on [Gather](https://gather.town/).
- Landscape orientation;
- Size: Widescreen (16:9)
Example of poster: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uO2CIA6ypEXUsjyD2baO9UW65oNPbdVz/view?usp=sharing
